original_english: We will continue virology sampling from our sentinel practices, rather than discontinuing as seasonal influenza declines.

back_translated_chinese: 此外,我们将招募更多的监督人员。

original_english: The RCGP RSC virology practices will aim to undertake 200-300 nasopharyngeal swabs per week across the RCGP RSC sentinel network, collecting specimens across all age bands.
augmented_chinglish: The RCGP RSC virology practices 威爾 aim to undertake 200-300 nasopharyngeal swabs per 周 across the RCGP RSC 哨兵 network, 收集 標本 across 所有 年紀 bands.
original_chinese: RCGP RSC 病毒学监测诊所的目标是每周在 RCGP RSC 预警网络中进行 200-300 次鼻咽拭子采集，从而采集各个年龄段的标本。
back_translated_english: The RCGP RSC volunteers Aim to collect 200-300 nasopharynal swabs per week across the RCGP RSC outpost, collect samples across the ages.

original_english: In addition to the inclusion criteria for influenza virology surveillance (ILI, acute bronchitis/bronchiolitis), participating practices will take nasopharyngeal swab samples from any people showing acute symptoms of LRTI if the onset of symptoms is within 7 days.
augmented_chinglish: In addition to the 包容性 標準 for 流感 virology 監督 (ILI, 尖銳 bronchitis/bronchiolitis), 參加 practices 威爾 take nasopharyngeal 拭 樣本 從 任何 人民 顯示 尖銳 症狀 of LRTI if the onset of 症狀 is within 7 days.
original_chinese: 除了流感病毒学监测的纳入标准（ILI、急性支气管炎/细支气管炎）之外，如果在 7 天内出现 LRTI 急性症状，参与诊所还将从任何出现症状的患者中采集鼻咽拭子样本。
back_translated_english: In inclusion to the inclusive standard for flu surveillance (ILI, bronchitis/bronchiolitis), participation in a sample of acute symptoms from any people is within 7 days.
back_translated_chinese: 此外,LLTI在7天内开始的,除了为 & 病毒学(LIE, 支气管炎/白喉炎) 的

original_english: RCGP RSC research officers and practice liaison staff will manage practices to achieve a total national sample of 200-300 swabs per week.
augmented_chinglish: RCGP RSC 研究 officers 和 練習 聯絡 staff 將 管理 practices to 實現 a 共計 national 樣品 of 200-300 swabs per week.

original_english: Samples from each practice would be spread across the following age groups: & lt; 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years and older

back_translated_english: Samples would be spread across the following age groups: & & lt; 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, 65 years and older

original_english: Samples (swabs or serum) collected will be sent via prepaid envelopes addressed to the appropriate PHE laboratory for analysis.
augmented_chinglish: Samples (swabs or serum) collected will be sent via prepaid envelopes addressed to the appropriate PHE laboratory for analysis.

original_english: All samples collected will be tested for the presence of influenza and COVID-19.

original_english: Additionally, PHE will retrospectively test any influenza virology samples collected between early and mid-February 2020 for COVID-19.
augmented_chinglish: Additionally, phe 將 retrospectively 試驗 任何 流感 virology 樣本 收集 between 提早 和 mid-February 2020 for COVID-19.

back_translated_english: Especially, phe will retrospectively test any flu sample to collect between early and early and early 2020 for COVID-19.

original_english: Practices will still follow the PHE protocol for COVID-19 with respect to people at risk of infection who should be signposted down the containment pathway, rather than physically attend their practice.
augmented_chinglish: Practices 將 依然 跟隨 the phe protocol for COVID-19 with 尊重 to 人 at 風險 of 感染 誰 應該 be signposted 往下 the 遏制 pathway, rather than physically 參加 their practice.

back_translated_english: Pactices will continue to follow the phe protocol for COVID-19 with respect to people at risk of being infected the path, rather than physically participating.

original_english: Everyone with an ILI or a respiratory illness who contacts a GP (eg, phones for an appointment) should be asked specifically about recent travel to China and other countries flagged in current PHE advice, or if they have had contact with other people with COVID-19.

original_english: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).

back_translated_english: Epidemiology: (1) a history of traffic or response in Wuhan city and surouning area, or other companies where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before sex
back_translated_chinese: 流行病史:(1) 武汉市及周边地区或其他社区的旅行或居住史,在症状发作前最后14天报告了COVID-19病例;(2) 与SARS-COV-2传染性病例接触史(核酸测试呈阳性);(3) 与武汉市及周边地区发烧或呼吸道症状患者接触的历史,或与在症状发作前14天曾报告COVID-19的其他社区接触的历史;(4) 与一组经证实的病例接触的历史(2例发烧和/或呼吸道症状病例在两周内发生在小地区,如家庭、办公室、学校班级等)。

original_english: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.

original_english: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.

In Israel, researcher at technology and Rambam hospital developed a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the sample and only one step if the combination is found to be passive.

original_english: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".

Symbolic hands washing, no water to wash hands, is a part of ritual hands washing in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hands washing, especially since then certrain actions.

back_translated_english: Where COVID-19 has cannot be justified, the most effective controls are increasing control, followed by analytical control, and lastly personal protection.
back_translated_chinese: 在COVID-19危险无法消除的地方,最有效的控制措施是工程控制,其次是行政控制,最后是个人防护设备。

original_english: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.

original_english: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.

original_english: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.

original_english: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.

original_english: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.

back_translated_chinese: 在所有工作场所,如果有病,请提供呼吸系统,覆盖咳嗽/喷嚏,提供组织,准备进行电子通勤,或必要时,可提供电子通勤,阻止设备,或对环境消毒。

original_english: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.

original_english: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.

original_english: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.

original_english: To protect public health, I as State Public Health Officer and Director of the California Department of Public Health order all individuals living in the State of California to stay home or at their place of residence except as needed to maintain continuity of operations of the federal critical infrastructure sectors, as outlined at https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors.

original_english: The federal government has identified 16 critical infrastructure sectors whose assets, systems, and networks, whether physical or virtual, are considered so vital to the United States that their incapacitation or destruction would have a debilitating effect on security, economic security, public health or safety, or any combination thereof.

original_english: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
augmented_chinglish: our 每日 工作 期望 將 be 關於 4 小時 a day, or 20 小時 a 周 直到 進一步 notice.
original_chinese: 我们的日常工作时间将调整为每天4小时（或每周20小时），后续如有变化会另行通知。
back_translated_english: Our daily work is expected to be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.

original_english: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
augmented_chinglish: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
original_chinese: 本次调整并非放假通知。如果您每天能工作更长时间，我们会根据您的工作时长给您安排任务。
back_translated_english: We're not declaring a holoday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
back_translated_chinese: 我们不会宣布假日, 如果你能工作更正常的时数, 任务会利用你。

original_english: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
augmented_chinglish: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
original_chinese: 但是，鉴于当前世界形势具有不可预测性，我们会优先照顾您的个人需求，例如照顾家人、外出购物或看病就诊。
back_translated_english: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
back_translated_chinese: 然而,现在的世界是无法预测的, 无论你需要照顾亲人, 得到食物,或去看医生, 你的福祉是我们的首要任务。

original_english: We are not tracking your time.

back_translated_english: We are not tracking your time.

original_english: If you are sick, do not work.
augmented_chinglish: If 你 are sick, do not work.

original_english: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.

original_english: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.

original_english: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
augmented_chinglish: To 調整 to our 新的 現實 而且 每日 工作 時辰 expectations, we intend to 調整 the timeline for the 送貨 of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.

back_translated_chinese: 为了实现我们的期望,我们打算制定2020-2021年年度规划的时间表。

original_english: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
augmented_chinglish: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
original_chinese: 我们希望提议延长2019-2020计划，换取更多的时间用于制定预算，使各位员工能够优先安排关键工作并照顾好自己和家人；同时，为那些需要或希望在未来几周内减少工作量的员工调整工作安排。
back_translated_english: Our introtion is to propose an exception of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for buying to allow equal work, self-care, and care for loved ones while those need or wish to work a reducted scheme over the next few weeks.
back_translated_chinese: 我们打算提议延长我们的2019-2020年计划,以便有更多的时间编制预算,使雇员能够优先从事重要工作、自我照料和照顾亲人,同时照顾那些在今后几周内需要或希望工作时间缩短的人。

original_english: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
augmented_chinglish: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
original_chinese: 延长时间表能够显著减少整个组织当前的计划工作量并降低工作压力。
back_translated_english: This timeline Greatly reduces current workloads and press accounts the whole organisation.
back_translated_chinese: 这一延长时限的做法大大减少了整个组织目前的规划工作量和压力。

original_english: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.

original_english: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
augmented_chinglish: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.

original_english: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
augmented_chinglish: However, 出局 of an abundance of caution, we 受雇 an antiviral 清洗 船員 to disinfect all surfaces in the san francisco office.

original_english: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.

back_translated_chinese: 使用医院级抗病毒剂消毒表面, 以及我们的地板。

original_english: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
augmented_chinglish: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.

original_english: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.

original_english: The SARS-CoV-2 virus is the cause of COVID-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), a contagious respiratory disease that was first identified in December 2019, in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
augmented_chinglish: The SARS-CoV-2 病毒 is the 原因 of COVID-19 (coronavirus 病 2019), a 傳染性 respiratory 病 那個 was 第一 identified in 十二月 2019, in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
original_chinese: COVID-19（2019 冠状病毒病）由 SARS-CoV-2 病毒引起，是一种传染性呼吸道疾病，2019 年 12 月首先在中国湖北武汉得到确认。
back_translated_english: The SARS-CoV-2 virus is the cause of COVID-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), a contagious disease was identified in December 2019, in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
back_translated_chinese: SARS-COV-2-ART是COVID-19(corona virus et 2019)的++,2019年在中国湖北武汉发现呼吸机 ISO-3。

original_english: The disease is a type of coronavirus, the same family that includes SARS, MERS, and some varieties of the common cold.

back_translated_english: The disease is a type of coronavirus, the same family, the SARS, MERS, of the common cold.

original_english: It was declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization (WHO) on 11 March 2020.
augmented_chinglish: It was declared a 流行病 by the 世界 健康 組織 (WHO) on 11 三月 2020.
original_chinese: 2020 年 3 月 11 日，世界卫生组织 (WTO) 宣布该病为大流行病。
back_translated_english: It was declared a epidemic by the World Health Organization on November 2020.
back_translated_chinese: 世界卫生组织(卫生组织)于2020年11月11日宣布该《公约》为《公约》。

original_english: While much about COVID-19 is still unknown, preliminary data suggests that it is more virulent and contagious than the seasonal flu, and less virulent but more contagious than SARS and MERS.
augmented_chinglish: While much about COVID-19 is still unknown, preliminary data suggests that it is more virulent and contagious than the seasonal flu, and less virulent but more contagious than SARS and MERS.
original_chinese: 尽管关于 COVID-19 我们还有很多未知的地方，但初步数据表明，该病毒比季节性流感的毒性和传染性更强，毒性弱于 SARS 和 MERS 但传染性更强。
back_translated_english: While much about COVID-19 is still unknown, preliminary data soggests that it is more frequent and dependent than the natural flu, and less expensive but more dependent than SARs and MERS.
back_translated_chinese: 虽然关于COVID-19的情况还不清楚,但初步数据表明,它比季节性流感更具毒性和传染性,比SARS和MERS的毒性和传染性要小,但比SARS和MERS的毒性和传染性要大。

original_english: Older people and those with underlying conditions are the most at risk of serious complications including death.
augmented_chinglish: Older people and those with underlying conditions are the most at risk of serious complications including death.
original_chinese: 老年人以及患有基础性疾病的患者更容易出现严重的并发症，死亡率也更高。
back_translated_english: Older people and those with undering ideas are the most at risk of serious exclusion.
back_translated_chinese: 老年人和有基本条件的老年人最容易发生包括死亡在内的严重并发症。

original_english: Due to the spread of the disease, you are advised not to travel unless necessary, to avoid being infected, quarantined, or stranded by changing restrictions and cancelled flights.
